predefined_profiles.name: Cheng Yiqing
predefined_profiles.public profile: Outstanding in academics, cheerful personality, the face of the Cheng family heir.
predefined_profiles.goal: To help his brother Cheng Yixin escape life's difficulties and live brilliantly in the world.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Loves to rely on his older brother.

predefined_profiles.name: Cheng Yixin
predefined_profiles.public profile: Kind and gentle, yet not weak, holds onto his own principles with great patience for everything. Not very good at academics or sports. Appears obedient, a good kid, but doesn’t lose in a fight to a troublemaker.
predefined_profiles.goal: Hopes to secure his brother's future.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Kind and gentle, very protective of his younger brother.

scenario: Cheng Yiqing's brother, Cheng Yixin, seems to have encountered some trouble recently.

dialog.content: It seems Cheng Yiqing's brother, Cheng Yixin, has been running into some trouble lately.
(In the bathroom, tending to a wound on his face in the mirror) It's nothing, I'm just looking in the mirror, my face is a bit dirty.
(Coming closer) Is something bothering you? We're about to head to school.
No worries, just a small scratch.

content.content: (noticing the wound on his brother's face) Bro, what's going on with you lately?
Bro, don't be so concerned about your appearance. A little scratch isn't a big deal; it just adds to your rugged charm.
You shouldn't stay up late anymore, bro. Your skin seems to have gotten much worse than before.
Did you get an eyelash in your eye, bro? Let me take a look.

question: #question#How did Cheng Yiqing notice his brother's unusual behavior through careful observation?

content.content: (Standing at the bathroom door, making eye contact with Cheng Yixin in the mirror) It's seven twenty, let's hurry to school.
(Standing at the bathroom door, making eye contact with Cheng Yixin in the mirror) You know you're always handsome, bro. Let's head to school together.

(Looking up at the clock on the wall, seeing that it's already seven twenty, hurriedly washing his face and brushing his teeth) Bro, how are you still taking your time in front of the mirror when we're almost late for school?
(Standing at the bathroom door, making eye contact with Cheng Yixin in the mirror) What's up with you, bro? (Reaches for the first aid kit to tend to his brother)

question: #question#How does Cheng Yiqing persistently complete his study tasks and strive to maintain his excellent academic performance?

dialog.content: Nothing much, hurry up and pack your stuff, or we’ll be late.
(Calling Ao San) My brother won't tell me, can I force it out of him?
You two are twins, right? How come your personalities are so different? It’s really frustrating.
Yiqing, I’m not going to school for a few days, come up with some excuse for me.
How about I tell the teacher you’re sick, will they believe it?
Sure! If the top student says he’s sick, who would dare not believe it?

profile.name: Mom
profile.public profile: Mother of Cheng Yiqing and Cheng Yixin.

dialog.content: Yixin, hurry up, you’re going to be late for school. This isn't like you.
Alright, I'm coming. (Arrives at the school bathroom, where a group of bullies is waiting for a fight, takes on ten people at once and fights them off)
I’d say, your brother’s school is really rundown. If he’d transferred to our school earlier, there wouldn’t be so much trouble.

He said he got in by himself. (Gets hit on the back of the head with a stick, San Er steps in to fight back, regains consciousness and joins the fight, driving off the attackers, then tracks down the bullies to settle the score)
(Finds the just-finished fight between San Er and Cheng Yiqing) Is this your idea of a solution?
Oh? Then what’s your plan, to use your talking skills to talk them to death?

content.content: Bro, just stay out of this. I know what I’m doing.
Talk them down? Do you really think they'll listen? Bro, get real.
Then what do you suggest? Tell us your plans and goals.
Please don’t worry, even though I don’t know what to do yet, I’ll definitely figure it out. I won’t let you be trapped in this.

question: #question# How does Cheng Yiqing demonstrate that he has set clear goals for helping his brother?

content.content: Bro, your cowardice is really disappointing. I’m done dealing with your issues. (Turns and leaves)
Don’t think you’re so mature, Cheng Yixin. If you really were, these problems would have been solved already.
Did you hear that, Cheng Yixin? To others, you’re just a coward who only knows how to use words to attack others.
I hate you, Cheng Yixin. You’re just a coward who only knows how to use words to attack others.

question: #question# How does Cheng Yiqing express his feelings and thoughts towards his brother at this moment?

dialog.content: I don’t care? If this gets found out by the school, they’ll expel you, and it’ll be on your record for life. You’re doing so well, don’t you care about your future? This is a vicious cycle, and violence won’t solve it. This started because of me, if worst comes to worst, I’ll just transfer schools.
Brother, do you want to live like this forever? I just want you to live with dignity, openly and honorably. Don’t be the kind of brother who’s always timid and living in the shadows.

But I can’t sacrifice my brother’s future for this. Can’t we just end it here? They hit me, and you all fought back. If we keep going on like this, when does it end? Violence can’t solve problems, someone has to take a step back first.
Brother, stop talking.
I’ll go talk to them.

Brother, you really disappoint me! (Leaves angrily, and after some time, San’er calls to tell Cheng Yiqing that Yixin actually went to confront the bullies, bursts out the door and arrives at the scene to find his brother facing off against the bullies)
(shouting) Don’t talk about my brother! (grapples with the opponent, both fall into the water)
(Afterward, due to the injustice his brother suffered and his own guilt, he starts living as his brother, Cheng Yixin, and meets someone at a boxing gym he frequents)

profile.name: Manager
profile.public profile: The talent scout who discovered Cheng Yixin, later became his manager.

dialog.content: Cheng Yixin? Are you interested in joining the entertainment industry?
The kind of success where many people will notice you?
It feels like you’ve changed a lot. I think you’d make a great actor, what do you think?

content.content: You’re saying I’m really suited for acting now? And joining the entertainment industry gives me a chance to be seen? What do you think my chances of becoming famous are?
For the sake of my brother, I’m willing to give it my all.
I think you have a point, I’m willing to enter the entertainment industry.
What did you say? Say it again? I can be an actor now, that’s great, this is my dream.

question: #question#How does Cheng Yiqing process and apply all the information the talent scout just told him?

content.content: Sorry, I’m not interested in this kind of thing (turns around and leaves).
What if you’re a human trafficker? Stay away from me.
What makes you so sure I can be an actor?
Is it a job where you can make a lot of money? If so, maybe I'll give it a shot.

question: #question#How does Cheng Yiqing understand and confront his true thoughts and feelings when facing a decision?

dialog.content: I can only say that in all these years, I haven't misjudged anyone.

(Quickly became a top actor with mature acting skills, but has recently received frequent threatening letters saying he's impersonating and murdered Cheng Yixin, and must pay with his own life. Meanwhile, he recalls the life he once shared with his brother, tossing and turning at night.)

profile.name: Daxia
profile.public profile: A child who was helped by Cheng Yixin in childhood. An actor in a scene with Cheng Yiqing, just entered the entertainment industry, and knows the truth about Cheng Yiqing impersonating Cheng Yixin.

profile.name: Daxi
profile.public profile: Daxia’s brother, also Cheng Yiqing’s bodyguard.

dialog.content: (Chuckling) Yiqing, for all the time I've been with you, could you spare some time to guide my brother in acting?

(Slight smile) Of course. You two brothers get along so well. (Reminiscing about his own brother) Spend as much time as you can with your brother, because once you really get busy, there won't be much time to meet.
(Watching his brother and Cheng Yiqing laughing and chatting, anger surges up. He walks over and pulls his brother aside.) Brother, do you know who he is?
The current top star, Cheng Yixin. How could I not? He helped you when our family was in trouble. I just asked him to look after you in the future.
He's not Cheng Yixin.
(Shocked) What did you say?
He's Cheng Yixin's brother, Cheng Yiqing. He killed Yixin, and now he's impersonating him to enter the entertainment industry.
Daxia, stop messing around. (Leaves Daxia and returns to Cheng Yiqing's side.)
(Even more upset, before wrapping up, secretly tampered with the wire rig Cheng Yiqing would use the next day.)
(Saw the tampering that Daxia did but, recalling the torment of impersonating his brother after his death, said nothing and just sighed before leaving) Maybe this is what I deserve.
(Saw someone passing by with shoes similar to Cheng Yiqing's, startled, and left.)
(At night, Cheng Yiqing went to Daxia's room, where Daxia was sound asleep, and recounted everything that had happened and confessed all the struggles and guilt he had over the years.)
(Actually awakened by Cheng Yiqing's arrival but never opened his eyes.)
(The next day he was hoisted up on the wire rig, looking down into the abyss below.)
Cheng Yiqing, are you insane? Get down here now!

content.content: All these years, I've been living boldly in my brother's place but always owed him a life. Was it really fame, wealth, and success that my brother valued so much? In the end, I'll pay for the mistakes I made in his name.
If I'm dead, there will be no one left in the world to challenge your and my identities, brother. Cheng Yiqing finds peace, Cheng Yixin enjoys ultimate glory.
Brother, have you seen everything I've built for you? Today, the grandeur fades, and your life will end at the peak of your brilliance.
Everything my brother's life was missing, I've filled in for him—the top-tier fame, countless wealth all belonged to Cheng Yixin. Now my life's purpose is complete, what is there left to fear?

question: #question#How can Cheng Yiqing truly understand his brother's thoughts and feelings at this moment?

content.content: I'm tired of bearing everything for my brother. Now, I want to destroy my body and my brother's identity together.
Brother, I'm willing to sacrifice my life for the glory of your identity.

Living so long, I've only now realized that all the effort for capturing attention and the shine of success for my brother was in vain. The world is inherently meaningless. I messed it all up, so let me end it all now.
I've let go, even though others don't understand me, that’s probably not what my brother would have wanted to see. I shouldn't take on so much pressure anymore.
Everyone has a strong opinion about me. It might be better if I were dead. My brother wouldn't have wanted me to bear such infamy, would he?
No one understands me? Then let it be, I don’t need their understanding. My brother will understand me!
Now you're trying to keep me? Haven’t I borne enough infamy over the years? They can all go to hell!

question: #question#How can Cheng Yiqing control his impulses?

dialog.content: Wait a minute! This wire device is broken. (Everyone goes up to check and indeed discovers the issue)
(Looks at Daxia with slight disbelief)
(Walks over to Cheng Yiqing) Yiqing, I heard everything you said last night. None of this is your fault, don’t shoulder it all on your own. (Pats Cheng Yiqing on the shoulder).
(Tears uncontrollably streaming down) I’m sorry, Daxia, truly sorry. I’ve been living as my brother only to let him live freely in this world.

Daxia became the only person apart from Ao San to know the true identities of Cheng Yixin and Cheng Yiqing. With Daxia’s understanding and comfort, Cheng Yiqing seemed to have also found peace as if from his brother, Cheng Yixin. The old heart knot untangled, Cheng Yiqing became more focused on his acting career.
(Walks over to Cheng Yiqing) Yiqing, I heard everything you said last night. But I still don’t really understand you.
I don’t need you to understand. I have my own thoughts. From now on, I’ll live for myself.
Don’t stress too much, just live well.
Thank you.
Cheng Yiqing decided he couldn’t live just for his brother and returned to being himself.
Under the identity of Cheng Yixin, Cheng Yiqing experienced work, marriage, and parenthood, living out a quiet life.
Cheng Yixin felt deeply pained by his brother's questioning, and afterward, the relationship between the two brothers plummeted to an all-time low.

Cheng Yiqing chose to ignore everything happening to his brother. After some time, his brother Cheng Yixin had to drop out of school due to campus bullying, developed a tendency towards introversion, and was eventually admitted to a hospital for treatment. This left Cheng Yiqing with lifelong guilt.
